column1: Honored to receive the ALSIC Health Care Innovation Champion Award from the Wyoming Hospital Association the Casper and Cheyenne Chamber of Commerce & Wyoming Medical Society. Grateful for all those who are helping WY face the challenges of COVID:  https://t.co/gWLbzuORmL https://t.co/aW9uV7tGdu

It's clear that @SpeakerPelosi still hasn't gotten the message: Republicans want to work toward a common sense COVID relief bill that helps the American people. Unfortunately Democrats are more focused on partisan games & pursuing their radical agenda. #LetsWork https://t.co/C3fjRNJrvP

The recent news from Moderna & Pfizer means we are closer to defeating COVID with a safe & effective vaccine. Once approved by FDA #OperationWarpSpeed will deliver millions of vaccine doses to Americans free of charge: https://t.co/OaJeYuG0cM

Our nation faces real challenges because of the coronavirus pandemic and its economic consequences. We need serious competent leadership to address these issues and that means we need a new Speaker of the House. https://t.co/6spELJX7qf

House Democrats have a choice to make: will they continue to support @SpeakerPelosi's efforts to block COVID relief for Americans that need it or will they sign @HerreraBeutler's discharge petition extending the Paycheck Protection Program for small businesses? #FightForSmallBiz https://t.co/HVbh6H2hWZ

It was great to talk with members of the Cheyenne Chamber of Commerce and provide an update on COVID-19 relief at Wednesday's virtual Wyoming Business & Industry Federation's annual fly-In. https://t.co/PSVKNI7Lsf https://t.co/MIhiPtyjKm

I always enjoy spending time with @GovernorGordon and had a chance to meet with him this week to discuss COVID relief energy issues important to our state and the Mountain West Conference. https://t.co/w1DwPDwtrk

According to Speaker Pelosi:  Brokering a historic agreement between Israel & Bahrain = a "distraction"  Holding China accountable for COVID19 = a "diversion"  You can always count on Speaker Pelosi to put her own political agenda before the safety of the American people.

The Senate is voting today on a COVID-19 relief package that provides targeted aid for families and small businesses. Unfortunately for the American people Speaker Pelosi is still holding relief legislation hostage so that she can pass her partisan wish list. https://t.co/as4aptOLom

Through the China Task Force House Republicans are taking the lead in holding the CCP accountable for unleashing COVID-19 on the world. It's shameful that Speaker Pelosi refuses to work with us while promoting CCP propaganda. Why is she protecting them? https://t.co/JNzjS7mo8c

Monday's House Oversight hearing wasn't about saving the USPS. The facts show that USPS is properly funded. This was a fabricated attack by Speaker Pelosi for political purposes even though she's still holding COVID-19 relief hostage in an effort to pass her partisan wishlist. https://t.co/plGDkFrljX

Democrats are hiding at home because they are unable to defend Speaker Pelosi's refusal to actually sit down and do what's necessary to help the country combat COVID-19 hold China accountable and more. https://t.co/eOwXAORClp https://t.co/pazgMHdB2V

These latest COVID-19 negotiations are just another example where Speaker Pelosi has refused to work in a bipartisan way to do what's right for the country. https://t.co/eOwXAOA1tR https://t.co/5OASICQWGV
Why won't Speaker Pelosi hold the CCP accountable for spreading COVID-19 around the globe? Why is she protecting them? https://t.co/q2lc2GcZed https://t.co/J6lnigOeOk

The Paycheck Protection Program has supported over 50 million jobs during the COVID-19 pandemic. This includes support for 13231 small businesses in Wyoming. PPP funds continue to be a lifeline for small businesses and their workers. Learn more here: https://t.co/EXjNhT1drV https://t.co/3L38VkHwYJ

This week I joined @SenatorEnzi and @SenJohnBarrasso in requesting an extension of exploratory unit deadlines for oil and gas operators impacted by COVID-19. This is crucial relief for Wyoming’s energy industry as they deal with the coronavirus pandemic. https://t.co/htVJpvp5lQ

Yesterday @SpeakerPelosi said that efforts to hold China accountable for spreading COVID-19 are “a diversion.”  A real diversion was when she consumed the House Intel Committee with impeachment instead of focusing on global threats including the pandemic threat from China: https://t.co/6LjsBn3ysM

The Chinese Communist Party caused COVID-19 to spread around the globe inflicting economic devastation because they did not want to be the only nation that suffered. The United States must lead the world in holding them accountable. https://t.co/x77FkEOHv6

Click on the link below to read my latest newsletter with updates on coronavirus relief efforts including updated information about accessing Paycheck Protection Program loans for small businesses. https://t.co/HVyJNMLPev https://t.co/ctznYL0KzY

Nurses are working around the clock risking their lives and separating themselves from their families in order to defeat COVID-19. We thank you for your service during this time and for all you do for our communities. #NursesAppreciationWeek https://t.co/W7RsXm6Bh0
I agree with former FDA Commissioner Scott Gottlieb that our next steps in the battle against coronavirus must focus on persistent prevention screening and treatment efforts. https://t.co/uaCEHRc1nQ

The economic shutdown caused by coronavirus has severely impacted Wyoming's energy producers. Our state's coal gas and oil workers need regulatory relief in order to continue providing affordable energy for American families. https://t.co/U7gpkqv6R2

There is no question that because of the Chinese Communist Party's lies because of their cover-up because of the way that they’ve operated they caused COVID-19 to spread globally and they’ve got to be held accountable. https://t.co/mnF4errzaP

Safeguarding our nation’s food supply is a critical component necessary to defeat the spread of coronavirus. I support the President’s use of the Defense Production Act to ensure American families have a reliable supply of food to put on their tables. https://t.co/bBE2xAhhrE

Speaker Pelosi and Congressional Democrats have been playing political games since the COVID-19 crisis began and they are hurting American families. More funds are desperately needed for the Paycheck Protection Program now. https://t.co/DNzG6UF9nM

As long as the World Health Organization is doing the bidding of the Chinese Communist Party they’re costing lives not saving lives. We must hold the CCP accountable for its lies and disinformation efforts about the spread of coronavirus. https://t.co/mFGMt8Ttal

They are holding hostage lifesaving aid in order to push their “Green New Deal” agenda. https://t.co/TbiYy5Wh9a https://t.co/xRjYjAhNpq

I'm working closely with Congressional leaders on a third coronavirus relief bill focused on delivering immediate aid to American families workers and small businesses. Click here to get the latest updates on efforts to combat the spread of COVID-19: https://t.co/R4bwmO166a https://t.co/69lTKLRJMt

President Trump has now signed two emergency bills into law that will expand resources for medical care and economic relief. Learn more about these bills and what is being done to combat the impact of coronavirus: https://t.co/x5usrx9ZIo https://t.co/RUAvCEmJvf

You can visit https://t.co/kSpGCsqvUk for daily updates about what we are doing in Congress and with the Trump Administration to defeat coronavirus help the people of Wyoming and restore our economy. https://t.co/Lp0i8O12fs

This is a trying time for our country & state as we work to mitigate the threat posed by coronavirus. I want to make sure you have all the latest information about the public health & economic aspects of this challenge. Read more in my latest newsletter: https://t.co/C5krwsENbx

Are you a Wyoming small business owner impacted by coronavirus? The SBA’s Economic Injury Disaster Loan program can provide you with loans to help overcome the temporary loss of revenue you might be experiencing. Learn more: https://t.co/0L6bSxqdjI

President Trump’s actions and the House bill passed tonight are important steps to combat coronavirus.   Our nation will face challenging times in the coming weeks. We must put partisanship aside and come together to overcome this challenge https://t.co/ETVeFyU1Hx

Spoke today w/ Dr. Harrist Stefan Johansson and Stephanie Pyle of @health_wyoming about the work being done at the federal state and local level to prepare for the coronavirus. The health of the people of Wyoming is our number one priority. Grateful for the work they’re doing. https://t.co/5u3EDtrP9I

Pathogens do not respect party lines. Combating coronavirus will require bipartisan cooperation. We have a duty to make sure that the nation is prepared. https://t.co/225rlX5aBf https://t.co/nDc5XAQaIn
